verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You dance over me
While I am unaware
You sing all around
But I never hear the sound

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Lord I'm amazed by You
Lord I'm amazed by You
Lord I'm amazed by You
How You love me

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
You paint the morning sky
With miracles in mind
My hope will always stand
For You hold me in Your hand

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
How wide
How deep
How great
Is Your love for me
